channel.title: cool-stuff on MapLibre
channel.description: Recent content in cool-stuff on MapLibre

item.title: Terrain3D
item.description: The Terrain3D #1022 of Max Demmelbauer from Toursprung was merged into main. Thanks for all the hard work! You can now try out the 3D feature yourself with the pre-release version MapLibre GL JS v2.
